DOC.brief_summary: To investigate whether extended lymphadenectomy ( CME ) laparoscopic colectomy could improve disease-free survival patient right colon cancer , compare standard D2 radical operation .
DOC.brief_title: Investigate Radical Extent Lymphadenectomy LAparoscopic Right Colectomy Colon Cancer ( RELARC ) .
DOC.detailed_description: Our study design two-arm , parallel-group , single-blind randomized clinical trial . The enrolled colon cancer patient would divide intervention group ( CME group ) control group ( D2 radical operation group ) . The postoperative adjuvant chemotherapy determine pathological result . For patient stage Ⅲ patient stage Ⅱ unfavorable histologic feature , six month adjuvant chemotherapy XELOX fluorouracil-based regimen recommend . The postoperative examination perform every four month first two year every six month follow three year , exclude local recurrence distant metastasis . Our study expect last five year , two year recruit patient , three year follow-up .
